thread.title: Beautifully-shot video of a box being made
thread.title_full: Beautifully-shot video of a box being made

author: Rob Beschizza
title: Beautifully-shot video of a box being made
text: Watching Laura Kampf build a poplar projector box is an education in 1) excellent craftsmanship and 2) tools I must now get. The way dovetail jointing is illustrated is particularly fascinating: in 5 minutes of well-shot arty youtube cinema I feel I learned more than a dozen talky howto videos where the content is buried somewhere after a minute of intro music, five minutes of "HEY GUYS" rambling, and nine more fooling around in the shop. Don't miss the sketchbook!
